row.process:
echo off
!following are sanity checks on the input data :IF STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_WAS_HOST#) = "" : SET &TARGET_LOCAL# = "TRUE" : SET &UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP# = "localhost" :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP# = &UC4RB_WAS_HOST# :ENDIF
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
